name: Nosco Labs
description: We connect you to other global minds through our bespoke introductions solution

team.name: Henri Ashe-Taylor
team.bioHtml: CEO of Nosco Labs. Ex- Rocket Internet, Speedinvest. McGill & ESADE Business school alum

jobs.title: Tech Lead
jobs.description:
We are building the future of 1:1 introductions. Our solution has been validated and we are now looking to expand our offering. Come join an exciting team and play a material impact in the platform's growth!

About the role
•	Work in close collaboration with the management team
•	You are a techie through and through with deep expertise in data science, software engineering, product development, machine learning or artificial intelligence.
•	You want the freedom to choose your stack and not be boxed in a specific area.
•	Discover and implement new technologies that yield competitive advantage
•	Supervise system infrastructure to ensure functionality and efficiency
•	Build quality assurance and data protection processes
•	Monitor KPIs to assess technological performance
•	Use stakeholders’ feedback to inform necessary improvements and adjustments to technology
•	Communicate technology strategy to partners and investors

Requirements
•	Creative - we are giving you license to show your creative flair
•	Passionate - we are looking for someone who cares about this solution as much as we do
•	You have experience in a similar role within an international SaaS business
•	You have built or worked on highly availability systems supporting large user numbers
•	You have programming, infrastructure planning and team management experience
•	Business fluent English, other languages a plus

Interested? Send us your CV and we'll be in touch if there's a good fit!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are building the future of 1:1 introductions. Our solution has been validated and we are now looking to expand our offering. Come join an exciting team and play a material impact in the platform's growth!

About the role
• Work in close collaboration with the management team
• You are a techie through and through with deep expertise in data science, software engineering, product development, machine learning or artificial intelligence.
• You want the freedom to choose your stack and not be boxed in a specific area.
• Discover and implement new technologies that yield competitive advantage
• Supervise system infrastructure to ensure functionality and efficiency
• Build quality assurance and data protection processes
• Monitor KPIs to assess technological performance
• Use stakeholders’ feedback to inform necessary improvements and adjustments to technology
• Communicate technology strategy to partners and investors

Requirements
• Creative - we are giving you license to show your creative flair
• Passionate - we are looking for someone who cares about this solution as much as we do
• You have experience in a similar role within an international SaaS business
• You have built or worked on highly availability systems supporting large user numbers
• You have programming, infrastructure planning and team management experience
• Business fluent English, other languages a plus

Interested? Send us your CV and we'll be in touch if there's a good fit!
